param.name: menutype
param.label: Category display type
param.description: You can set the display type to *links* to have the default display type: a link list. If you set it to *dTree*, the categories will be displayed in a dTree structure.

param.name: jscook_type
param.label: JSCook Type
param.description: The Style for Displaying the categories: Menu or Tree

param.name: jscookMenu_style
param.label: JSCookMenu Style
param.description: The Style for the JSCookMenu. Only fill in when you have selected JSCookMenu as Display Style

param.name: menu_orientation
param.label: JSCookMenu Orientation
param.description: If you choose JSCookMenu: Either let it display horizontal or vertical!

param.name: jscookTree_style
param.label: JSCookTree Style
param.description: The Style for the JSCookTree. Only fill in when you have selected JSCookTree as Display Style

param.name: root_label
param.label: Label of the dTree Root
param.description: Whatever you fill in here: it will be displayed in the root of the dTree.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
